description.ko: 자연스러운 움직임과 리드미컬한 전환을 시각적으로 탐구하며, AURA-7이 유기적이고 유동적인 기하학적 형태를 통해 빛과 형상을 지닌 살아있는 생명체처럼 구현됩니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of natural movement and rhythmic transitions, where AURA-7 manifests as a living, breathing entity of light and form through organic, fluid geometries.

prompt: Cinematic 3D render of AURA-7 embodying organic flow, liquid silk textures, iridescent gradients shifting between teal and pearl, soft undulating curves resembling biological structures, bioluminescent pulses, macro photography depth of field, 8k resolution, ethereal lighting, seamless natural patterns, fluid dynamics in a void
